title: Agbe
author: Agbe
created_time: August 01, 2022, 03:21:08 PMLast edit: August 01, 2022, 05:26:22 PM by Agbe

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: On the reputation board, there is a special thread moderated by BitcoinGirl.Club to let people know about your achievements while at bitcointalk, that should include your wish to thank the manager. It might be good if a lot of users organized to post there what they have accomplished, including you.Announce your rank up, merit or any achievements that makes you feel great!However, if you want to open a service and want to tell people about your services, it's a good idea to create a thread on the service board and let them know what you can provide.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Quote from: _BlackStar on August 01, 2022, 03:34:47 PMOn the reputation board, there is a special thread moderated by BitcoinGirl.Club to let people know about your achievements while at bitcointalk, that should include your wish to thank the manager. It might be good if a lot of users organized to post there what they have accomplished, including you.Announce your rank up, merit or any achievements that makes you feel great!However, if you want to open a service and want to tell people about your services, it's a good idea to create a thread on the service board and let them know what you can provide.I know that but I was thinking that since I want to create another thread on the BitcoinGirl.Club thread, it might be a spam that is why I create this one here. That is not withstanding, if it is not spamming then I will lock this one.
